articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Nuggets throttle Suns to reach NBA's last four while Celtics force Game 7 - The Guardian
articles.description: Denver ousted Phoenix to reach the Western Conference finals while Boston defeated Philadelphia to force a winner-take-all Game 7 in the East semis
articles.content: Nikola Jokic scored 32 points in another triple-double, Jamal Murray added 26 and the Denver Nuggets advanced to the Western Conference finals for the first time since 2020 by beating the short-hande… [+5111 chars]
